ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a number of fields are populated prior to progressing past the initial mortgage opportunity stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.DeveloperName = "OW_mortgage"
&&
( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Provide advice" ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Broker mortgage" ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Await completion" ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Completed" ) )
&&
( ISBLANK( OW_date_precise_fp_fact_find_sent__c ) || ISBLANK( Amount ) || ISBLANK( CloseDate ) || ISBLANK( OW_date_of_initial_interest__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To proceed, please ensure you have specified the following fields: amount, close date, date PreciseFP fact find sent, date of initial interest.
